reviewText: This movie it is a Must for poetry and love

I love this kind of film. You either get it or you don't and you either like it or hate it. My husband actually watched it with me, got it, and liked it. It starts out slow but once you understand the nuances, it captivates you till the end.
This is the kind of movie that everyone should see at least once in their life time....  If you love poems of Mario Benedetti then you must see this movie.
